homepage.page.title: BKPassword
homepage.page.description: Securely store your passwords in your browser.
homepage.delete-dialog.title: Delete Password
homepage.delete-dialog.description: This password will be permanently deleted from this browser. It's stored only on this device and not backed up anywhere else. This action cannot be undone. Are you sure you want to continue?
homepage.info-dialog.title: Your Privacy Is Our Priority
homepage.info-dialog.description: BKPassword works entirely in your browser. Your passwords are:
homepage.info-dialog.list-1: Encrypted locally — All passwords are encrypted directly on your device using AES-256 encryption before being stored.
homepage.info-dialog.list-2: Never transmitted — We have no servers. Your data never leaves your device and is never sent over the internet.
homepage.info-dialog.list-3: Locally stored — Encrypted passwords are saved only in your browser's local storage, accessible exclusively on this device.
homepage.info-dialog.description-bottom: You maintain complete control over your data. For extra security, remember to clear your browser data when using shared devices.
homepage.password-field.service.label: Website or Service
homepage.password-field.username.label: Username or Email
homepage.password-field.password.label: Password
homepage.passwords-dialog.title: Manage your passwords
homepage.passwords-dialog.no-passwords.t: Save your passwords securely in this browser.
homepage.passwords-dialog.no-passwords.d: They're encrypted and stored only on this device.
homepage.toasts.unable-to-retrieve-passw: Your stored password data appears to be damaged or modified.
homepage.toasts.password-updated.title: Password updated!
homepage.toasts.password-added.title: Password added!
homepage.toasts.password-deleted.title: Password deleted!
404.page.title: 404: This page could not be found - BKPassword
404.description: Looks like this page is locked away and we've lost the password.
404.sub-description: Good thing you have BKPassword for all your important credentials!
500.page.title: Something Went Wrong - BKPassword
500.description: We're experiencing a technical issue on our end.
500.sub-description: This is not your fault. Please try again or return to the home page.
validation.one-of: Must be one of the following values.
validation.not-one-of: Must not be one of the following values.
validation.min-number: Must be greater than or equal to {min}.
validation.max-number: Must be less than or equal to {max}.
